sub_title: Expert on Research Collaborative Grants at Erasmus Universiteit Rotterdam
summary:
Experienced Project Manager with over 10 years demonstrated history in the management of European funded projects, mostly in Human Resources Development. I have experience in Planning, Conception, Budgeting, Monitoring and Evaluation of HRD grants with 14 projects totaling EUR 13.2mn successfully written and/or implemented. 

I enjoy working in a multi-cultural environment and I am open for new challenges and opportunities.

projects.title: 1. EUROHOST – Jobs for congenial young people
projects.description:
I was the Project Manager of this international strategic project ( (ID POSDRU/125/5.1/S/125308), financed under European Social Fund within Sectorial Operational Program Human Resources Development 2007-2013 (SOPHRD 2007-2013) - applicant Inceptus Romania Association:
- general management, planning and control of a EUR 1.7 million project
- coordinating a project team of 124 persons and an international partnership: 5 partners from Romania and Spain (NGO’s, private companies, public bodies)
- succeeding to facilitate employment for almost 1000 people, particularly long-term registered as unemployed and young unemployed people from both urban and rural areas; 77% succeeded to be trained and receive a diploma recognized in the EU
- 4 practice stages successfully organized in the region of Asturias in Spain - succeeding to support 260 persons to be employed or opening their own business

contributors.headline: Expert on Research Collaborative Grants at Erasmus Universiteit Rotterdam

projects.title: 2. Skills for Jobs
projects.description:
Awareness and information expert for this strategic project (ID POSDRU/160/2.1/S/141384) financed under European Social Fund within SOPHRD 2007-2013 (applicant Employment Agency Cluj, partner Inceptus Romania Association):
- Providing awareness and information seminars to the target group of the project: 20.000 students in the 9th and 10th grades enrolled in the national pre-university education system from 2 regions in Romania (North-West and West) in order to facilitate the transition from school to active life.

contributors.headline: Expert on Research Collaborative Grants at Erasmus Universiteit Rotterdam

projects.title: 3. ARO – Fast access to employment
projects.description:
Monitoring and professional training expert for this strategic project (ID POSDRU135/5.2/S/134193), financed under European Social Fund within SOPHRD 2007-2013 (applicant Romanian Academy, Cluj Napoca Branch).
- successfully organize authorized trainings for unemployed people from rural areas in order to facilitate employment

contributors.headline: Expert on Research Collaborative Grants at Erasmus Universiteit Rotterdam

projects.title: 4. A chance to employment for women and youngsters from the rural area!
projects.description:
Monitoring expert for this regional project „A chance to employment for women and youngsters from the rural area!” – ID POSDRU/110/5.2/G/88071 (applicant The Association for Support and Rural Development-ASDR Dezmir, partner Inceptus Romania Association)
- monitoring&evaluation of project progress, drafting reports, change management

contributors.headline: Expert on Research Collaborative Grants at Erasmus Universiteit Rotterdam

projects.title: 5. From tradition to occupation!
projects.description:
Technical progress and procurement expert for this regional project (ID POSDRU/110/5.2/G/88055) (applicant Romanian Academy, Cluj Napoca Branch)
- coordinating drafting of progress and implementation reports, verification of partner reports, proposing corrective measures, coordinating public procurement procedures

contributors.headline: Expert on Research Collaborative Grants at Erasmus Universiteit Rotterdam

projects.title: 6. Regions for Jobs
projects.description:
Technical and financial evaluation expert in this international strategic project “Regions for Jobs” – ID POSDRU/82/5.1/S/50496 (applicant Chamber of Commerce Bistrita-Nasaud)
- objective and relevant feedback regarding all national and international project activities to the project manager
- evaluation of the partnership effectiveness and efficiency during implementation
- evaluation of working methods and project planning, technical and financial implementation, communication within the team, risk and change management
- proposes recommendations and corrective measures

courses.name: Regional Training Program (RTP) Expert for Romania in the field of Social Policy organized by TAIEX, DG Enlargement, European Commission (Brussels, Bucharest, Valencia)

profile_positions.description:
Project Manager and Board Member at Inceptus: http://www.inceptus.ro/

 Coordination and conception of 14 projects in the field of Human Resources Development totaling EUR 13.2 mn: 
-	6 EU funded projects (totaling EUR 6.5 mn) successfully implemented
-	6 social/culture/education projects financed by private funds successfully implemented
-	1 EU project for Romanian Diaspora (EUR 3.4 mn) where I am the coordinator of activities - in implementation
-	1 EU project for Start Ups Development (EUR 3.4 mn) where I am the Project Manager - in implementation
• General management, project control and coordination, risk management and create partnerships
• Ensuring consistency in projects budgets and strategic planning
• Ability to assign tasks, manage and motivate teams of over 10 persons, also in international partnerships
• Ability to work in multicultural and multi-disciplinary teams

Please see projects section for more details.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Consultant for conception of business plans within the national program “Startup Nation Romania 2017”, the national plan for “Rural Development 2014-2020”, Regional Operational Program 2014-2020 in Romania.
profile_positions.title: Business funding consultant

profile_positions.description:
Expert in various projects financed by Structural Funds (European Social Fund) within Sectorial Operational Program Human Resources Development 2007-2013 in:
1. Education: Awareness&information expert in the strategic project ”Skills for Jobs” (applicant Employment Agency Cluj, partner Inceptus Romania Association)
2. Employment & Training: Monitoring and professional training expert in the following projects: 
• Strategic project ”ARO - Fast access to employment” (applicant Romanian Academy, Cluj Napoca Branch)
•Regional project „From tradition to occupation!” (applicant Romanian Academy, Cluj Napoca Branch)
•Regional project „A chance to employment for women and youngsters from the rural area!” (applicant Association for Support and Rural Development-ASDR Dezmir, partner Inceptus Romania Association)
•Strategic project “Regions for Jobs” (applicant Chamber of Commerce Bistrita-Nasaud)
3. Training for public servants: Training expert in the strategic project ”Specialization and skills upgrade for improving professional competencies of public servants staff” (applicant Employment Agency Sibiu County, partner Inceptus Romania Association)

volunteer_experiences.description:
Successfully writing, coordinating/implementing social, cultural and educational projects (private donors):
• Stiftelsen Lillehammer Museum (Norway) - Cooperation & best practice exchange to support and create Ethnographic Museum in Mera (Transylvania, Romania) financed by EEA&Norway grants
• The Park of Colours –ecological education for 152 visually impaired highschool students
• Green for education - ecological education for 150 highschool students from Bistrita
• Green colored hours - ecological education for young students from 5 rural villages in Cluj County
• 100% Made in Rural – creating&promoting fashion collections with traditional patterns
• Art in a garden - Organizing a symposium with 33 works of contemporary art
